main event: A silver round object was sighted hovering over a house in Fountain, Colorado Springs on October 30, 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately three minutes,The object rose and flew at a high rate of speed to the southwest,The weather conditions were clear with unlimited visibility during the sighting,No aircraft activity was noted in the area at the time,The sighting was reported by Mr. William Martin and documented by Capt Walter K. Wilson.
